job_description: Job Title: Business Analyst / QA Consultant ‚Äì Loan IQ (Finastra)Role SummaryThe Business Analyst / QA Consultant will support implementation, enhancement, integration, and quality assurance of the Finastra Fusion Loan IQ system. The role combines business analysis, functional expertise, and QA/testing responsibilities to ensure Loan IQ solutions align with banking business requirements, regulatory standards, and system integration needs.Key Technical & Functional RequirementsLoan IQ ExperienceMinimum 5 years of hands-on experience with Finastra Fusion Loan IQ implementations, upgrades, or support. Strong understanding of Loan IQ framework, architecture, and data model. In-depth knowledge of Loan IQ Data Dictionary (version 7.7.x). Expertise in Loan IQ functional configurations and end-to-end process flows for syndicated and bilateral loans. Strong experience in RFR (Risk-Free Rate) functionality. Loan IQ SDK & Integration Competent in Loan IQ SDK development, including:Inquiry Scripts Event Management Scripted APIs Scripted Batch Processing Expert knowledge of:SDK scripted batches Event triggers and controller events Inquiry APIs Ability to debug interface and functional issues effectively. Experience with nightly batch processing, loan processing, pricing, accruals, and accounting. Payments, Accounting & GL Strong understanding of Loan IQ MX Payments. Expertise in GL generation through:Batch Accounting Online Accounting Solid knowledge of loan accounting, accruals, and financial postings. Loan IQ Modules (Expert Level)Customer Setup Deal & Facility Building Outstanding Creation Portfolio Management Secondary Sales Payments (Principal, Interest, Fees) Fee Types (Ongoing, Event, Administrative) Circles (Internal & External) Trade Ticket Entry Swaps and Collaterals Adhoc Queries and Ticklers Repayment Schedules Technology StackCore Java / J2EE XML and REST APIs Oracle Database, including packages and stored procedures Business Analysis & QA ResponsibilitiesReview and analyze Business Requirement Specifications (BRS). Prepare functional specifications, test scenarios, and detailed test cases covering all scope areas. Perform SIT and UAT testing for Loan IQ and integrated banking systems. Conduct test scope analysis, regression testing, and test execution. Manage defect lifecycle, including logging, tracking, resolution, and reporting. Ensure accurate execution status reporting to stakeholders. Track and document changes to business and functional specifications. Validate system integrations with core banking and downstream systems. Operational & Support ResponsibilitiesProvide technical and functional assistance in evaluating and improving banking systems and procedures. Coordinate with system analysts, developers, and vendors to design and enhance solutions. Prepare system business cycle specifications and manage calculation, posting, and control outputs. Create and support user documentation, procedures, and training materials. Answer application-related queries from internal teams and external stakeholders. Participate actively in performance review and operational meetings. Ensure strict compliance with data protection, confidentiality, and banking security standards. Education & ExperienceBachelor‚Äôs degree in Finance, Computer Science, MIS, Engineering, Business Administration, or related field. Minimum 4 years of experience in banking system implementation or support. At least 3 years of IT experience, preferably in loan administration or core banking systems. Strong exposure to Loan IQ implementations, testing, or production support. Required Soft SkillsExcellent verbal and written communication skills in English (Arabic preferred). Strong business process analysis and mapping skills. Excellent time management and ability to work under tight deadlines. Strong customer service orientation. Ability to collaborate effectively across teams and reporting hierarchies. Strong planning, organization, and task ownership. Ability to interact professionally with senior stakeholders and vendors. Strict adherence to banking ethics, code of conduct, and confidentiality policies. Skills: rfr,sdk development,rest apis,xml,stakeholders,architecture,data model,system analysts,java,gl generation,loan iq framework Show more Show less
